Such was the fable of King Nicholas, which sprang from an ignorance of the Guarany language, was perpetuated by malice, and spread over all the world. Tubicha signifies great among the Guaranies; and Mburubicha, King or Cacique. Among the companies of Indians sent to plough the land, to cut and carry wood„or to serry on the river, there is always a chief, who direets their motions, and whom they address by the title of lisamlerabichffi our chief or captain.
